imdb.plot outline: Marty Collins escapes mundane life as a computer refurbisher by playing "The Game," a fantasy role-playing world where he's the hero of the story. But when fellow player Gordon Grater greasily double crosses Marty's character, Marty must convince an unlikely group of new players to help him reclaim his fantasy world-and The Monday Knights are born. Too-cool Sam, beautiful newbie Ryn, power-tripping Phan, and everyman Marty have their work cut out for them and a fast-approaching deadline for their quest. In an adventure spanning worlds real and imaginary, Marty ultimately discovers that not all treasures are found in dungeons.
imdb.title: The Monday Knights
plot: _The Monday Knights_ (qv) is an interactive web comedy series about a bunch of nerds. Created and produced by Prescott Harvey in Portland, OR.

Marty Collins escapes mundane life as a computer refurbisher by playing "The Game," a fantasy role-playing world where he's the hero of the story. But when fellow player Gordon Grater greasily double crosses Marty's character, Marty must convince an unlikely group of new players to help him reclaim his fantasy world-and _The Monday Knights_ (qv) are born. Too-cool Sam, beautiful newbie Ryn, power-tripping Phan, and everyman Marty have their work cut out for them and a fast-approaching deadline for their quest. In an adventure spanning worlds real and imaginary, Marty ultimately discovers that not all treasures are found in dungeons.
